string-array.name: taskList
string-array.item: Calculate the least common multiple of the values stored in $a0, $a1, and return it to $v0
Sort the INTEGER array in the stack in ascending order. The address of the first element is stored in $a0, and the size of the array is stored in $a1. Note each integer element occupies 4 bytes!
Calculate the greatest common divisor of the values stored in $a0, $a1, and return it to $v0
Find the sum of all even primes, and return it to $v0
